text: CLOSE Christopher Boykin aka Big Black passed away this week at age 45. USA TODAY The man who encouraged us to ` ` do work'' has died and many celebrities are in mourning. News broke Tuesday that Christopher ` ` Big Black'' Boykin, partner in hijinks to skateboarder and entrepreneur Rob Dyrdek on their MTV series Rob & Big, passed away. E! and People report he died after suffering a heart attack. During the series that aired from 2006 - 2008, the entertaining duo provided viewers many laugh - till - it - hurts moments, including the adoption of a mini horse and an unforgettable trip to a car wash which allowed them to lose themselves to Enrique Iglesias'Do You Know? which blared through the speakers.
